summary: This is a response from 4chan's Law Enforcement Support team to a subpoena (Case ID: 2019R01059) dated August 14, 2019. The email attaches requested records and notes that the Custodian of Records for 4chan Community Support LLC is not a US citizen, requesting an alternative certification form or waiver of the declaration requirement.

persons.name: Mr. IMP
persons.context: Addressed in the email as the recipient of the subpoena response and attached records from 4chan LEO Support.

events.title: 4chan Subpoena Response
events.description: 4chan LEO Support responds to a subpoena (Case ID: 2019R01059) by providing attached records and inquiring about certification requirements due to the Custodian of Records not being a US citizen.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on August 14, 2019, with Case ID 2019R01059, requesting records from 4chan.
4chan's Custodian of Records for 4chan Community Support LLC is not a US citizen, complicating the certification of records.
The response includes attached files: '4chan_Report_2093_(Case_ID_2019R01059).txt' and 'ATT00001.txt'.
